more.requirement: • Education: High school diploma • Experience in hotel and/or restaurant services essential • Must be service-minded to meet customer needs • Must possess some F&B product knowledge • Good communication both in English & Vietnamese • Having experience at the same position is preferred
more.description: • To deliver Food and Beverage service of high standard and in accordance with standards and procedures. • To provide efficient, expedient and courteous to guest leading to total the guest and company satisfaction. • To prepare for service by ensuring the department’s: o Grooming is impeccable and in accordance with the company standards Ensure that outlet is ready for service and guest comfort (music is on, lighting is on, glassware is polished, the restaurant is clean, etc.) o Check up all the items needed before putting it in use. Be responsibly minded for the breakage and loss of such items. o To lay up the table, side station, bar counter, mezzanine. To ensure all the items required for the set-up are clean, unspotted and in place. • To be courteous, warm and smiling while dealing with guest. Be efficient and fast and serve with confidence and flair. • Must be familiar with all menu items, their preparation and service procedure. • To listen guest’s complaints. Rectify wrong doings and report to Supervisor/ Assistant Restaurant Manager all the comments from Guests. • Be able to regularly pass training examinations • Assist team members with sections and work if all work in their assigned section is taken care of • To handle other task when assigned by the company.
more.benefit: _ 13th salaray _ Working in a professional and dyamic enviroment _ 12 days annual leave per year _ Annual Company Party, Company Trip
